description: One of the seven heads of the 88 kiyakou. A human turned Inugami who serves Tamazuki faithfully. He was bullied relentlessly by a group of humans led by Tamazuki and killed them releasing his power. He hates and envies Rikuo for having both Human and youkai allies. He can transform into a large dog or separate his head from his body. He is killed by Tamazuki after failing to kill Rikuo. A stray dog appears at the end of the Arc that may be his reincarnation.
name: Inugami
